data.name: Ricks Hunter Demo
data.detailed_description:
Metamorfose S is a 2D action-adventure game with RPG elements.

This is a game in metroidvania style, with different levels, equipments, spells, drop system and a huge map to explore which is accecible as long as you get more habilities during the game.


In Metamorfose S you take control of Sebastian, an experiment created by Gerry, the
scientist.


Gerry created many intelligent species, but one of them managed to escape and released all the others to join forces with itself against the humans, with the exception of Sebastian, who remained asleep.


It is possible to manufacture equipments with the materials droped by the enemies.


Because he was made only to kill, Sebastian has orders to exterminate all the rogue the rebel species, orders given by Gerry, who already predicted they could escape.

Saigon, the rebel leader, killed Gerry and took control of the laboratory. He kept Sebastian preserved in one of the capsules until they were able to develop a system that could convince him to fight on their side, but before this could happen, a drone controlled by the humans invaded the lab and awakened Sebastian.

Now your mission as Sebastian is to escape the huge and heavily guarded maze.


Game Features:
- 2D Metroidvania Style Gameplay
- Good Variety of Items and Equipments
- Selectable Spells
- Enemy Loot System
- Bestiary
- Map With Progress in Percentage
- Simple Item Crafting System
- Character Leveling System
- Bosses
- Steam Achievements
- Steam Collectible Cards
- Xbox 360/One Controller Support

data.short_description: Metamorfose S is a 2D action-adventure game with RPG elements in metroidvania style.

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or a newer version
  • Processor: Dual-Core with 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB of RAM with Webgl support
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12
  • Processor: Dual-Core with 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB of RAM with Webgl support
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
  • Processor: Dual-Core with 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB of RAM with Webgl support
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
